data.Name: CoinMarketCap
data.Description: Coinmarketcap is a website for tracking capitalization of various cryptocurrencies.

data.Name: CoinGecko
data.Description: CoinGecko is cryptocurrency ranking and evaluation site that breaks down quantitative and qualitative data for a number of different metrics.

data.Name: CryptoCompare
data.Description: CryptoCompare is an interactive platform where you can discuss the latest crypto trends and monitor all cryptocurrency markets streaming in real time.

data.Name: CoinLib
data.Description: Coinlib is the project that provides readers with real-time information about the cryptocurrrency market, as well as crypto-related news.

data.Name: CoinCodex
data.Description: Coincodex is a digital platform of cryptocurrency market coverage with real-time coin prices and charts.
